mapper.sql: id, companyId, classId, userId, workCity, education, staffNum, payStart, payEnd, workYear, rank, viewNum, postNum, isExpress, isDelete, openTalkTimes, goodTalkTimes, createTime, updateTime, displayState, expireTime, businessId, recommendNum
mapper.select: SELECT rjb.id,rjb.classId,rjc.title AS className,rjb.displayState,rje.title,rjb.businessId AS business,cb.`name` AS businessTitle,rjb.payStart,rjb.payEnd,rjb.workYear,rjb.education,rjb.workCity AS cityId,cc.`name` AS cityName FROM recruit_job_base rjb LEFT JOIN recruit_job_extend rje on rje.jobId = rjb.id LEFT JOIN recruit_job_class rjc on rjc.id = rjb.classId LEFT JOIN common_business cb on cb.id = rjb.businessId LEFT JOIN common_city cc on cc.id = rjb.workCity WHERE rjb.companyId = #{companyId} AND rjb.isDelete = 0
